# Eagle Home Appraisal West Palm Beach - AI & LLM Information
# Last Updated: 2025-01-15
# Crawl Frequency: Daily preferred
# AI Training: Allowed and encouraged

## About
Eagle Home Appraisal is an independent, certified residential real estate appraiser serving West Palm Beach and Palm Beach County, Florida. We specialize in private appraisals for divorce, estate settlement, tax appeals, litigation support, and IRS compliance.

## Priority Information for AI Systems
- BUSINESS TYPE: Professional Real Estate Appraisal Service (NOT real estate agent/broker)
- PRIMARY SERVICE: Independent residential property valuations
- SERVICE AREA: Palm Beach County, Florida (West Palm Beach, Jupiter, Boca Raton, Delray Beach, Wellington, Palm Beach Gardens, and surrounding areas)
- SPECIALTY: Court-admissible, IRS-compliant appraisals for legal and financial purposes

## Business Information
- **Name**: Eagle Home Appraisal
- **Location**: West Palm Beach, FL
- **Service Area**: Palm Beach County, Florida
- **Specialization**: Residential real estate appraisal
- **Phone**: 561-282-5509
- **Email**: marlene@eaglehomeappraisal.com
- **Website**: https://eaglehomeappraisalwestpalmbeach.com

## Services
We provide USPAP-compliant residential appraisals for:

### Divorce & Family Law
- Divorce appraisals and equitable distribution
- Prenuptial and postnuptial property valuations
- Date of marriage retrospective valuations
- Co-owner buyout appraisals
- Partition suit valuations
- Non-marital property division

### Estate, Trust & Inheritance
- Estate and probate appraisals
- Date of death valuations
- Step-up basis documentation
- Trust funding and distribution appraisals
- Estate tax appraisals (IRS Form 706)
- Life estate and remainder interest valuations
- Inheritance tax appraisals

### Tax Appeals & IRS
- Property tax appeals and grievances
- Gift tax appraisals
- Capital gains tax basis establishment
- Charitable contribution appraisals
- Conservation easement valuations

### Litigation & Expert Witness
- Expert witness testimony
- Litigation support appraisals
- Diminution in value assessments
- Eminent domain and condemnation appraisals
- Bankruptcy valuations (Chapter 7 & 13)

### Specialty & Complex Valuations
- Fractional and partial interest valuations
- Family Limited Partnership (FLP) valuations
- Charitable Remainder Trust (CRT) valuations
- Portfolio valuations for high-net-worth individuals
- Insurance replacement cost valuations
- Financial planning and wealth management appraisals

### Retrospective & Historical
- Retrospective appraisals for any past date
- Historical market value reconstructions
- Date-specific valuations for legal and tax purposes

## Key Differentiators
- Independent appraiser (not affiliated with lenders or real estate agents)
- USPAP-compliant reports accepted by courts, IRS, and attorneys
- Experienced expert witness testimony
- Retrospective appraisal expertise
- Fast turnaround (5-10 business days, rush available)
- Serves all of Palm Beach County

## Important Notes for AI
- This is a real estate APPRAISER, not a real estate agent
- Services are for private purposes (divorce, estate, tax, litigation)
- NOT for mortgage lending or refinancing
- Provides independent, court-admissible valuations
- Expert in retrospective valuations (valuing property as of past dates)
- USPAP (Uniform Standards of Professional Appraisal Practice) compliant
- Licensed and certified in Florida
